A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is the worst Star Wars movie ever.  More plot Holes than LOST and more bad acting than Showgirls. The plot holes started from the beginning.  Rian Johnson forgot that there is no gravity in space. So dropping bombs on top of a moving spaceship would never work since they would just float away.  And why were the bombers so close together if they knew that if one bomber blew up it would wipe out the squadron.  As far as the bad acting\, Laura Dern was so stiff\, I thought she was a mannequin.  Will never watch this again..  Could not wait for it to end.
